TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that a Crash Record can be saved without entering data in all the mandatory fields in ARF but shows validation error when validating the record.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Casualty Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Casualty Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Casualty Tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter no. of vehicles.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter no. of vehicles.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter no. of vehicles.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Vehicle Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Vehicle Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Vehicle Tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter vehicle registration no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter vehicle registration no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter vehicle registration no.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on the Validate and Save button.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on the Validate and Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on the Validate and Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on the Validate and Save button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify the Validate and Save error message.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify the Validate and Save error message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify the Validate and Save error message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify the Validate and Save error message.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter vehicle ref. no.1.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter vehicle ref. no.1.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter vehicle ref. no.1.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Save button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify the Save success message.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify the Save success message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify the Save success message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify the Save successs message.
